query-mapping.description: Queries used by the permission manager

query.name: check-entity-permission
query.comment: Get the permission for a user and an entity
query.sql: SELECT acl.writeable FROM awa_acl AS acl WHERE acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.entity_id = :entity_id AND acl.entity_type = :entity_type

query.name: remove-permission
query.comment: Delete the permission associated with a user and an object
query.sql: DELETE FROM awa_acl AS acl WHERE acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.entity_id = :entity_id AND acl.entity_type = :entity_type

query.name: remove-entity-permission
query.comment: Delete all the permission associated with an object
query.sql: DELETE FROM awa_acl AS acl WHERE acl.entity_id = :entity_id AND acl.entity_type = :entity_type

query.name: remove-user-permission
query.comment: Delete all the permission associated with a user
query.sql: DELETE FROM awa_acl AS acl WHERE acl.user_id = :user_id
